game_description: Kaiten Sushi VR is a game that you can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant. Make sushi and serve to your customers within the time limit and make them happy. There are four game modes: - Endless Mode: No time limit but if you make five customers angry, game will over. - Time Limit Mode: In 10 minutes, serve as much sushi as possible. - Ninja Mode: The ninja is coming to kitchen and attacks you. Protect yourself from the ninja. - Free Mode: There is no limit. You can practice your skills in this mode. Enjoy!
review_1: LOL.., Worked in the food and beverage field for many years and this game took me back. Laughed alot watching myself fumbling trying to keep up with the orders, dropping food, plates, throwing completed orders on the belt. Had a ball... good game though I didn't get very far in the game. I RECOMMEND it to anyone who's been there and just needs a laugh!
review_2: I cannot pick up items, cut, or do anything with my controllers. I can only open & close certain doors. Will this be fixed soon? If not, I will need a full refund. UPDATE: The controllers work great once I opened the store. Thank you very much. It's a fun game :)
